The TaRL Assessment System is a comprehe: The TaRL Assessment System is a comprehensive educational platform designed to help teachers and mentors track student progress and improve learning outcomes through data-driven insights.
To empower educators with tools that ena: To empower educators with tools that enable them to assess students effectively, identify learning gaps, and provide targeted interventions that help every child learn at their appropriate level.
Progress tracking across multiple assess: Progress tracking across multiple assessment cycles
This system was developed in collaborati: This system was developed in collaboration with educational experts and technology partners to support the Teaching at the Right Level initiative.
Welcome to TaRL Assessment System Help: Welcome to TaRL Assessment System Help
Find answers to common questions and lea: Find answers to common questions and learn how to use the system effectively.
Use your email and password provided by: Use your email and password provided by your administrator. If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page.
How do I change my password?: How do I change my password?
Go to your profile by clicking your name: Go to your profile by clicking your name in the top right corner, then select 'Change Password'.
How do I update my profile?: How do I update my profile?
Click on your name in the top right corn: Click on your name in the top right corner and select 'My Profile'. You can update your information and upload a profile photo.
How do I add a new student?: How do I add a new student?
Go to Students menu and click 'Add New S: Go to Students menu and click 'Add New Student'. Fill in all required information and click Save.
How do I upload student photos?: How do I upload student photos?
When creating or editing a student, use: When creating or editing a student, use the photo upload field. Photos must be less than 5MB in size.
How do I search for students?: How do I search for students?
Use the search bar on the Students page. You can search by name or filter by school, grade, and gender.
How do I create an assessment?: How do I create an assessment?
Go to Assessments menu and click 'Create: Go to Assessments menu and click 'Create Assessment'. Select students and enter their scores for each subject.
There are three cycles: Baseline (beginn: There are three cycles: Baseline (beginning), Midline (middle), and Endline (end of term).
How do I view assessment results?: How do I view assessment results?
Go to Reports menu to view various asses: Go to Reports menu to view various assessment reports and analytics.
Student Performance, School Comparison,: Student Performance, School Comparison, Progress Tracking, and more. Access them from the Reports menu.
Most reports have an 'Export' button tha: Most reports have an 'Export' button that allows you to download data in Excel format.
Yes, most reports allow filtering by dat: Yes, most reports allow filtering by date range, school, grade, and other criteria.
